info.description: A RESTful API for managing todos with JWT authentication
info.title: GoTodo API

get.description: List anchors for a user (public/unlisted)

post.description: Create a new anchor for the authenticated user

get.description: Get anchor details and items
Get paginated list of comments

post.description: Add a new comment with @mention support
Like or unlike an anchor based on the action specified

get.description: Check if the current user has liked the anchor
Get summary of who liked an anchor, prioritizing users you follow
Get paginated list of users who liked the anchor

post.description: Login without Google OAuth - FOR DEVELOPMENT/TESTING ONLY
Authenticate user using Google ID token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile

post.description: Get a new access token using a valid refresh token
Revoke all refresh tokens for the current user

patch.description: Change username (can only be done once)

get.description: Get comment by ID

delete.description: Delete own comment or any comment on own anchor

get.description: Check if user has liked a comment
Get discovery feed of trending/popular public anchors from non-followed users
Get personalized feed of anchors from followed users
Get public anchors for a specific tag
Get personalized interest suggestions based on user activity or popular tags
Get metadata for a URL

post.description: Upload a file to Cloudinary (image, audio, or raw)

get.description: Get paginated list of user's notifications

patch.description: Mark all user's notifications as read

get.description: Get count of unread notifications

patch.description: Mark a single notification as read

get.description: Search across anchors and users
Search anchors with filters and pagination
Aggregate top results for anchors, users, and tags
Get tag suggestions based on prefix
Search users with pagination
Get the authenticated user's complete profile

delete.description: Permanently delete the authenticated user's account and all content

get.description: Get list of blocked users

delete.description: Remove the current user's cover image

post.description: Save interest tags for the authenticated user

delete.description: Remove the current user's profile picture

get.description: Get a user's public profile by ID

post.description: Follow or unfollow a user based on the action specified

get.description: Check if the current user follows the target user, and if the target follows back
Get paginated list of followers OR users being followed
Get pinned anchors for a specific user
